string.value: #p9000072# at the #b#m950100000##k seems to be worried about something. Talk to #b#p9000072##k.

#p9000072# says there is a very dangerous monster called #r#o9101005##k inside the cave he is guarding, and he doesn't know what to do. He says that you can't defeat it alone and that you must enter with other party members. Gather some party members and defeat #o9101005#.\n\n#o9101005##r #a105891##k
You defeated #o9101005#. Will the #m950100000# be safe now?

Oh, what should I do... If I allow this to continue, there might be more victims. But if I try to do something about it, the confusion that might occur will cause even more danger. Sigh... If I knew this would happen, I would've stopped Mr. Yoo at all costs... Is there anybody that could help...? \r\n#L0##bWhat's the problem?#l\n#k

Well, do you see that golden building? Lurking inside there is a creature named #rRavana#k. It's a very dangerous monster that was sealed inside a long time ago by ancient masters... \r\n#L0##bIf it's sealed up inside, then it shouldn't be a danger, right?#l\n#k

It was safe before, but now things have changed. As more outsiders come to the Golden Temple, its holy energy is diminishing, while the power of Ravana seems to be growing. At this rate, the Ravana may be able to break through the seal in no time. \r\n#L0##bThat sounds horrible! What can be done about it?#l\n#k

That's my dilemma. I wish I can just enlist help from the villagers to eliminate Ravana, but doing so might just cause more confusion and chaos in the village. But if I do nothing, Ravana will eventually reawaken. Is there anyone that could help...?

What, really? You think you can defeat Ravana? It might be sealed up right now, but it was so powerful at one time that it nearly conquered the world. If you want to attempt this, I think you will need some help.

Nevertheless, Ravana is still weaker than it used to be after being sealed up for such a long period. If you enlist others to fight with you, you may stand a chance. Fighting in a party is the only way you'll be able to defeat Ravana.
Now what? There is nothing else I can do. I must tell Mr. Yoo that all the tourists must leave...

Oh wow! You defeated #o9101005#! Unbelievable! How could I ever thank you enough? Now, the #m950100000# should be safe from danger. I don't have much to give you as a token of my appreciation, but please take this...
This should come in handy. Please use it well.
You haven't been able to defeat #r#o9101005##k yet? Please #bform a party and enter the Golden Temple#k.
